page.description: Alpha Anywhere provides the following methods for the collection object.
page.discussion: The collection object may be referred to as *[xb:<COLLECTION>]* in the collection method documentation. To call methods on a collection, replace the *[xb:<COLLECTION>]* placeholder with the name of the collection variable in your code. For example:
page.example: dim mycollection as U mycollection.SET("FJ","Fred Jones")
